product_name: CamelBak Trailblazer 15 Hydration Pack - 50 fl. oz. - Kids'
long_description: The kids' CamelBak Trailblazer Hydration Pack gives your children the pride of self-sufficiency and keeps them happily hydrated on outdoor adventures. 50 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features a durable, low-profile design and a wide mouth that seals with an easy quarter turn. Taste-free, polyethylene-lined drink tube features a Big Bite(TM) valve placed for convenient use. Comfortable suspension with diamond mesh-lined shoulder straps fits a child's frame; slit mesh back panel keeps a kid comfortable and cool. CamelBak Trailblazer Hydration Pack stays light with just the right capacity for an extra layer of clothing, snacks and gear.
short_description: The kids' CamelBak Trailblazer Hydration Pack gives your children the pride of self-sufficiency and keeps them happily hydrated on outdoor adventures.
